title: Repairs and renovation of existing installations of buildings used for operational purposes alone and which do not involve addition to or increase of built-up areas
clause_text: Repairs and renovation of existing installations of buildings used for operational purposes alone and which do not involve addition to or increase of built-up areas. In the case of the Railways/Metro Rail and Monorail/LRT Authority:

source_pdf.text_snippet: Repairs and renovation of existing installations of buildings used for operational purposes alone and which do not involve addition to or increase of built-up areas.
